Header: Fmr. Deputy Minister Premaratne jailed over bribery
Content: Former Deputy Minister Shantha Premaratne, who was from Ampara, has been sentenced to a 4-year rigorous imprisonment. Colombo High Court Judge, Piyasena Ranasinghe delivered the verdict today (09) when a case against the former Deputy Minister was taken up. The former Deputy Minister was accused of demanding and obtaining Rs. 50,000 bribe from a woman in Ampara in 2007. He was also ordered to pay a fine of Rs. 10,000.
